title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Entrepreneurship (EM) Development in Engineering Students

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering principles and grasp of basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply entrepreneurial thinking to engineering problem-solving using the KEEN 3Cs (Curiosity, Connections, Creating Value) framework.
Learners can iteratively improve problems encountered during the ideation process through at least three repeated attempts using mobile learning modules.
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively evaluate the social value (Creating Value) of engineering solutions through peer collaboration projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
